name: PHOBOPHOBIA case file #0: The Orphanage
description:
A serial killer has been caught, but the evidence isn't there to put him away.

You are the detective, and you have been sent to the abandoned orphanage the maniac grew up in to see if you can find anything that might help put him and his accomplices away.

Horrors await in the darkness...

Creature sound effects by Mazellmi https://www.youtube.com/@mazellmi
